title: Playboy: Gen X Girls
overview: The future has never looked so good! They were born and weaned on Nintendo, Beavis and Butthead and the Smashing Pumpkins. They golf, surf the net, pierce their tongues and drink double lattes. They possess an edge and an attitude that says "just dare me." They're the girls on Generation X and Playboy transports you into seven far-out fantasies that reveal their true talents and desires. These girls know what they want, and exactly how to get it. Join them as they eXcite, eXpose and eXhilarate!
